testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfullyGiven user go to register page
testcase.system-out: When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "mail@example.com" field...............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: When user go to login page..................................................passed And user login with "valid" "mail@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...............passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And user login to the system successfully...................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: When user go to login page..................................................passed And user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"............passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And user could not login to the system......................................passed
